mapper.select: select d.id, d.dic_name as dicName, d.dic_code as dicCode, d.dic_order as dicOrder, d.dic_type as dicType, d.dic_describle as dicDescrible from dictionary_type dt left join dictionary d on d.dic_type=dt.id where dt.dic_type_code=#{type}

select d.id, d.dic_name as dicName, d.dic_code as dicCode, d.dic_order as dicOrder, d.dic_type as dicType, d.dic_describle as dicDescrible from dictionary_type dt left join dictionary d on d.dic_type=dt.id where dt.dic_type_code=#{type} and d.dic_code=#{code}
